mapper.insert: insert into KoJinJoHoZhy (CP_NameSei, CP_NameMei, CP_NameSeiKana, CP_NameMeiKana, CU_AlphLastname, CU_AlphFirstname, CP_Country, CP_BirthDate, CP_Sex, CP_Denwa, CP_Phone, CP_ShokugyoCode, CP_KinmusakiName ) values (#{cpNamesei}, #{cpNamemei}, #{cpNameseikana}, #{cpNamemeikana}, #{cuAlphlastname}, #{cuAlphfirstname}, #{cpCountry}, #{cpBirthdate}, #{cpSex}, #{cpDenwa}, #{cpPhone}, #{cpShokugyocode}, #{cpKinmusakiname});
